Question
========

You roll three dice. Suppose X is the number of fours. Below you see a probability distribution of X. What then is the probability P(X = 3)?

  ----------------- --------- -------- -------- --- The value of X 0 1 2 3 P(X = x) 125/216 75/216 15/216 ? ----------------- --------- -------- -------- ---

\ (Give your answer in the form of a fraction: X/Y).

Solution
========

The correct answer is: 0.0046
